original_text: When all the Moabites heard that the kings had come up to fight against them, all who were able to put on armor, from the youngest to the oldest, were called out and were drawn up at the border.
korean_text: 모압의 모든 사람은 왕들이 올라와서 자기를 치려 한다 함을 듣고 갑옷 입을 만한 자로부터 그 이상이 다 모여 그 경계에 서 있더라

sentences.original_text: that the kings had come up to fight against them
all who were able to put on armor
sentences.korean_translation: 갑옷을 입을 수 있는 모든 사람은

sentences.original_text: from the youngest to the oldest
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 어린 사람부터 가장 늙은 사람까지

sentences.original_text: and were drawn up at the border
